faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about donating, volunteering, and supporting our mission

questions.question: How can I donate to Sixteensource Foundation?
questions.answer: You can donate through our secure online platform, bank transfer, UPI (donate@sixteensource), or by visiting our office. All donations are eligible for 80G tax exemption.

questions.question: What percentage of donations goes to programs?
questions.answer: 85% of all donations directly support our programs, 10% covers operational costs, and 5% is invested in future growth and sustainability.

questions.question: Is my donation tax-deductible?
questions.answer: Yes! All donations to Sixteensource Foundation are eligible for 80G tax exemption. You'll receive a tax exemption certificate for your donations.

questions.question: Can I choose which program my donation supports?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can specify which initiative you'd like to support - education, healthcare, women empowerment, agriculture, housing, or sanitation programs.

questions.question: How do you ensure transparency in fund utilization?
questions.answer: We maintain complete transparency through regular impact reports, annual financial statements, and detailed program updates. All financial information is publicly available on our website.

questions.question: What is the minimum donation amount?
questions.answer: There's no minimum donation amount. Every contribution, no matter how small, makes a difference. ₹500 can educate a child for a month, ₹2,000 can fund a medical camp.

questions.question: Can I make recurring donations?
questions.answer: Yes! We offer monthly, quarterly, and annual recurring donation options. This helps us plan long-term programs and create sustained impact.

questions.question: How can I volunteer with your organization?
questions.answer: We welcome volunteers in various capacities - from field work to office support. Visit our Volunteer page or contact us to learn about current opportunities.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to make a difference? Contact us to learn more about our programs, volunteer opportunities, or how you can support our mission.
